content:
I'd be happy to help you find a tonkatsu place near your location. However, I need to know which train station is nearest to you. Could you please tell me the name of the station or the line you're closest to?

If you're not sure, you can also give me your address or the nearest major intersection, and I can try to find some options for you.

Once I have that information, I can provide you with a list of highly-recommended tonkatsu places within a 10-minute walk from the nearest train station.
